text: José Vicente Anaya (22 January 1947 - 1 August 2020) was a Mexican writer, poet and cultural journalist. He was born in Chihuahua, Mexico. He wrote over thirty books and was part of the Infrarealism poetry movement in Mexico City. He also translated poems of Allen Ginsberg and Carl Sandburg. Anaya died on 1 August 2020 in Mexico City, aged 73.Fallece el poeta José Vicente Anaya a los 73 años ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Mexican poets Category:Mexican journalists Category:People from Chihuahua (state)
title: José Vicente Anaya
